edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm

Class MetricTrackingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm.MetricTrackingAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReinforcementLearningAgent, SimulationBasedReinforcementLearningAgent, java.io.Serializable

    public class MetricTrackingAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulationBasedReinforcementLearningAgent
    This wrapper object tracks the call metrics to another agent which are made through it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • iterate

        public boolean iterate()
        Description copied from interface: ReinforcementLearningAgent
        Performs some work in approaching a final policy. Note that multiple final policies may exist as a result of the particulars of the algorithm in question (such as a flexible definition of convergence); this algorithm will simply do work in an attempt to reach one of them.
        Specified by:
        iterate in interface ReinforcementLearningAgent
        Returns:
        true if a final policy was found; false otherwise.
